name: damp

effect.sword-shield: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
effect.the-isle-of-armor: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
effect.the-crown-tundra: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
effect.brilliant-diamond-and-shining-pearl: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
effect.legends-arceus: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.

short_effect: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.

flavor_text.sword-shield: Prevents the use of explosive moves, such as Self-Destruct, by dampening its surroundings.
